currEvents.title: FITC Toronto 2019
currEvents.description: FITC Toronto is a globally recognized industry event showcasing the best the world has to offer in design, digital development, media and innovation in creative technologies – its three days and nights of presentations, parties, installations and performances that unite and transform the industry.

currEvents.title: NMC: Game Night
currEvents.description: We’re hosting a game night in the lab! Feel free to bring your own favorite board games to play with all your friends in the lab. There will also be food in the form of WAFFLES! There will be toppings and hot chocolate as well.❣️

currEvents.title: NMC: T-shirt Contest
currEvents.description:
We've got another t-shirt contest! Make something cool and if it wins have it printed on t-shirts and sold! 

This contest is being sponsored by Imgix and they have chosen a fun prompt for us!
